title: Paging
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Dividing memory into fixed chunks (Pages). 
**Page Table**: Map. 
**TLB** (Translation Lookaside Buffer): Cache for Page Table (Speed). 
**Page Fault**: Page not in RAM -> Fetch from Disk.

interview_questions.question: What is Thrashing?
interview_questions.answer: Excessive paging. CPU spends more time swapping pages than executing. Performance crash.
